title.rendered: Macon Mural + Ohio + New Wimpy Kid!

content.rendered:
Macon Mural is Complete!

Our Macon location on Riverside Drive is turning heads!  Check out the photos of the mural that was just finished.  It has completely transformed that store.  Everyone seems to love it, and we are often finding people taking selfies in front of it!  Come on by and have a look… and take a selfie of your own!

 

 

Walls of Books, Ohio #2

The store in West Chester, OH is starting to look like a bookstore.  We are scheduled to open THIS FRIDAY, November 4.  It takes a long time to shelve 20,000 books and a few hundred toys, but the Walls of Books setup crew is knocking it out quickly!

 

Diary of a Wimpy Kid #11

We have the new Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Double Down book in stock at all Gottwals Books locations.  The MSRP is $13.95, but we are selling it for only $9.97… and remember you can return our books for 50% in store credit.  That means you’ll get $5 back in credit when you’re done.  It’s the best deal you’ll find anywhere, that’s for sure.

 

Inchimals!
